ch0089_00_n/0101_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. Have you
decided what you’re going to do today?
ch0089_00_n/0101_0701_02_10:
Your friend is saying they’re excited and that they
can’t wait to go on an adventure.
ch0089_00_n/0601_0701_01_10:
When I was little, I was separated from other
humans and raised by Pokémon.
ch0089_00_n/0601_0701_02_10:
That’s why I wanted to liberate them from being
confined in Poké Balls.
ch0089_00_n/0601_0701_03_10: It was all for the sake of Pokémon—my friends.
ch0089_00_n/0602_0701_01_10:
Humans and Pokémon alike should be freed from
the oppression of Poké Balls.
ch0089_00_n/0602_0701_02_10:
And we should create an ideal world, where
humans and Pokémon trust and help each other...
ch0089_00_n/0602_0701_03_10:
I want to create a world like that. That’s why I
left on a journey.
ch0089_00_n/0602_0701_04_10: Eventually, I found my way to Pasio.
ch0089_00_n/0602_0701_05_10:
When I first saw this place, I knew then that my
ideals were not mistaken.
ch0089_00_n/0603_0701_01_10:
The artificial island of Pasio is truly a
magnificent place.
ch0089_00_n/0603_0701_02_10:
The form of the land, the architecture, even the
arrangement of nature itself—it’s all perfect.
ch0089_00_n/0603_0701_03_10:
Nature is normally the result of formulas too
elegant to be dismissed as mere coincidence.
ch0089_00_n/0603_0701_04_10:
To reproduce something like that, one must
meticulously check their calculations for every
possible variable.
ch0089_00_n/0603_0701_05_10:
It’s no easy feat, which is why I’m pleasantly
surprised to see it happen on an artificial island
like Pasio.
ch0089_00_n/0604_0701_01_10: I can hear the voices of my friends—Pokémon.
ch0089_00_n/0604_0701_02_10:
Just like humans, Pokémon can feel emotions.
Anger, sadness, suffering...
ch0089_00_n/0604_0701_03_10: Your friend can feel those emotions, too.
ch0089_00_n/0605_0701_01_10: Battles do nothing more than hurt Pokémon...
ch0089_00_n/0605_0701_02_10:
That’s how I understood it in the past—and why
I hated battles. But I know now that it’s not
that simple.
ch0089_00_n/0605_0701_03_10:
Pokémon battles decide winners and losers, it’s
true. Yet they do so much more.
ch0089_00_n/0605_0701_04_10:
A Pokémon battle is a way for us to see what
wonderful things others have to contribute.
ch0089_00_n/1701_0701_01_10: Here, take this. I’m sure it will be helpful.
ch0089_00_n/1701_0702_01_10:
How you use an item you receive from someone
else is up to you.
ch0089_00_n/1701_0702_02_10:
I hope that you’re getting closer to achieving
your ideals.
ch0089_00_n/2501_0701_01_10:
In the past, I met a Trainer whose feelings were
strong enough to change the world.
ch0089_00_n/2501_0701_02_10:
That Trainer was recognized as a new hero
for wanting a world where humans and
Pokémon coexist.
ch0089_00_n/2501_0701_03_10:
I wonder how much love that Trainer has filled
their world with.
ch0089_00_n/2501_0701_04_10: That’s something I’d like to see.
ch0089_00_n/2501_0702_01_10:
Come to think of it, you somehow remind me
of that Trainer.
ch0089_00_n/2501_0702_02_10:
If you ask me what about you is the same, I’m
afraid I can’t say what exactly.
ch0089_00_n/2511_0701_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ], I have a question for
you. Is there something you think Pasio is lacking?
ch0089_00_n/2511_0701_02_10: I think it needs a ferris wheel.
ch0089_00_n/2511_0701_03_10:
I have no clue why such a complete and
developed island wouldn’t have one.
ch0089_00_n/2511_0702_01_10:
I love ferris wheels. The circular motion...
The mechanics... They’re like collections of
elegant formulas.
ch0089_00_n/2511_0702_02_10:
Furthermore, we’d get to see more of Pasio’s
wonderful scenery.
ch0089_00_n/2511_0702_03_10:
Pasio would become even more beautiful with a
ferris wheel. That’s what I think, anyway.
ch0089_00_n/2511_0702_04_10:
If they ever do build a ferris wheel here,
[Name:PlayerNickname ], let’s ride it together.
ch0089_00_n/3001_0701_01_10:
Have you ever noticed the shapes and angles of
Pasio’s architecture? The city, the stadium...
They’re like a collection of elegant formulas.
ch0089_00_n/3003_0701_01_10:
As someone who pursues his ideals, all I can do
each day is continue to follow what I believe is
my true path.
ch0089_00_n/3005_0701_01_10:
Your Pokémon... It was just saying how much it
likes you—and how it’s happy to be with you.
